description.value:
Totem of Owl

Totem Spirit (Wisdom) — Creation Cost: 7 Gnosis

Spirit Aspect: Foresight / Knowledge / Silent Judgment

Recommended Umbra Spirits (CR 8+)

To bind Owl, the pack must confront a spirit of memory, foresight, and watchful silence. Suitable spirits include:

  • Elder Night-Scholar Spirit (Owl Aspect) — Suggested base: Spirit-empowered Sphinx or sage guardian (CR 10–12), reflavored as an Umbra keeper of knowledge and omens
  • Watcher-in-the-Dark Spirit — Suggested base: Invisible Stalker–style entity (CR 8–9), augmented with divination effects and heightened perception
  • Astral Archivist Spirit — Suggested base: Githzerai Anarch or similar psionic stat block (CR 9–11), stripped of planar allegiance and treated as a spirit of foresight

These spirits rarely engage in combat. They test patience, memory, and the ability to act only when action is necessary.

Individual Trait

The creature who touches the Totem gains the following benefit until the next long rest:

  • You gain advantage on Intelligence (Arcana, History) and Wisdom (Insight) checks
  • When you roll initiative, you may choose to reroll the result and take either roll

Only one creature may benefit from this trait at a time.

Pack Trait

As an action, a creature touching the Totem may invoke Owl's foresight.

For 1 minute, while within 30 feet of the Totem:

  • Pack members gain advantage on their first saving throw each round
  • Once during the duration, one pack member may treat a failed saving throw as a success

This represents Owl's warning whispered just before disaster strikes.

Ban — Act With Purpose

Owl demands restraint and thoughtful action.

The pack must not act hastily or violently without understanding the situation, when observation or planning is reasonably possible.

If the pack repeatedly rushes into danger without forethought or ignores clear opportunities to gather information, the Totem becomes dormant and all its benefits cease.

To restore the Totem, the pack leader must reinvest the required Gnosis cost to reaffirm the bond.

If the pack repeatedly or egregiously violates this Ban, Owl may withdraw entirely, permanently severing itself from the Totem at the Storyteller's discretion.

Totem rules: Only one Totem per pack; benefits do not stack; a dormant Totem provides no benefits. Once a Totem benefit is used, it cannot be used again until after a long rest. Interacting with a Totem requires 1 action while touching it; choose either the Individual Trait or the Pack Trait.
